thread.title: Romana Food Brands Corp. name change to Romana Food Blockchain Corp. is Filed

author: cnbc.com
title: Romana Food Brands Corp. name change to Romana Food Blockchain Corp. is Filed
text:
OAKVILLE, ON, Feb. 6, 2018 /PRNewswire/ - Romana Food Brands Corp. (OTC: RFBC) announced today that it has filed its name change to Romana Food Blockchain Corp.
According to the company, the name change to Romana Food Blockchain Corp. was filed and a request was made to retain the same ticker symbol and no other corporate action was required. Under normal circumstances, approximately up to 2 weeks are required to obtain the approval for the name change.
"Our new brand identity and core corporate focus will clear a path for Romana to become the recognized expert in Food Blockchain and the traceability" said Morrie Fogelbaum, Chairman of Romana Food Blockchain Corp. "The cryptocurrency market continues to gain acceptance in the mainstream finance industry and same for the underlying blockchain technology in many industry" further added Mr. Fogelbaum
Romana Food Blockchain Corp is an emerging leader in the authentic Italian food sector. The company is in the final prices if acquiring food processing plants specializing in Italian products. It is currently in the final stages of acquiring plants in North America and in Italy.
About Romana Food Blockchain Corp.
Romana Food Blockchain Corp is an emerging leader in the authentic Italian food sector. The company is in the final prices if acquiring food processing plants specializing in Italian products. It is currently in the final stages of acquiring plants in North America and in Italy.
